title: Ticket #7815: Fix test_hold_and_release.py
description:

This test does not pass consistently in BaTLab, maybe because the "timeout [is] too short."

Seems to be doing OK. Marking this as resolved - any further timeout problems probably indicate some kind of problem (if nothing else, that the test machine is overloaded).
